divs: Sighting DetailsAfter watching fireworks me and my wife notice what we thought was a cinder in the sky, but after watching it for a few minutes we noticed it wasn't moving by the time I got to an area to record it it had disappeared.I discussed it at work with some coworkers and thy saw it to one guys kid saw it and he used his smart phone to see what it was using a sky map and said it was saturn.I have never seen anything like this before it's the same object that everyone on ufo tracker app is seeing some of the pictures and videos are exactly the same object
Object Shape: Egg, Fireball, Oval, Saturn-like, Star-like, Unknown
